name: Zapiekanki
steps: Heat oven to 200°C and bake baguettes 8–10 min.
Sauté onion in butter and oil, add mushrooms, cook until liquid evaporates.
Stir in garlic, seasoning and mayonnaise.
Split baguettes lengthwise, spread mushroom mix, top with cheeses, ham and kabanos, bake 8–10 min.
Top with caramelised onions, dill, chives and ketchup.

name: Zemiakové Placky
steps: Peel and grate potatoes, squeeze moisture.
Mix potatoes with onion, garlic, eggs, flour, marjoram, salt and pepper.
Fry thin pancakes until golden on both sides.
Drain on paper towels and serve hot.
